title: Right Front Wheel Speed Sensor Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the right front wheel speed sensor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, speedometer may be erratic.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty right front wheel speed sensor, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the right front wheel speed sensor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the right front wheel speed sensor.

title: Right Front Wheel Speed Sensor Circuit Low Input
description: This code indicates a low input signal from the right front wheel speed sensor circuit.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issue (low voltage, high resistance), faulty right front wheel speed sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the right front wheel speed sensor.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the right front wheel speed sensor.

title: Right Front Wheel Speed Sensor Circuit High Input
description: This code indicates a high input signal from the right front wheel speed sensor circuit.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issue (high voltage, short to power), faulty right front wheel speed sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the right front wheel speed sensor.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the right front wheel speed sensor.

title: Right Front Wheel Speed Sensor Circuit Intermittent
description: This code indicates an intermittent signal from the right front wheel speed sensor circuit.
symptoms: ABS warning light may illuminate intermittently, traction control may engage unexpectedly.
causes: Loose wiring or connectors, faulty right front wheel speed sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the right front wheel speed sensor.
severity: Moderate - Can cause unpredictable ABS/traction control behavior.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to monitor live data from the right front wheel speed sensor while driving.

title: Right Front ABS Wheel Speed Sensor Signal Fault
description: This code indicates a fault in the signal from the right front ABS wheel speed sensor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated.
causes: Faulty right front wheel speed sensor, air gap issue, debris on the sensor or tone ring.
solutions: Inspect the sensor and tone ring for damage or debris, check the sensor air gap, replace the sensor if necessary.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to observe the signal pattern from the right front wheel speed sensor.

title: Brake Pedal Switch Circuit High Input
description: This code indicates a high input signal from the brake pedal switch circuit.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, cruise control may not engage.
causes: Wiring issue (short to power), faulty brake pedal switch, misadjusted brake pedal switch.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the brake pedal switch, adjust the brake pedal switch if necessary.
severity: Moderate - Affects ABS and other systems.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to monitor the brake pedal switch status.

title: Brake Pedal Switch Circuit Intermittent
description: This code indicates an intermittent signal from the brake pedal switch circuit.

description: This code indicates a low input signal from the brake fluid level sensor circuit.
symptoms: Brake warning light illuminated, ABS warning light may also illuminate.
causes: Low brake fluid level, wiring issue (high resistance, low voltage), faulty brake fluid level sensor.
solutions: Check and top up brake fluid level, inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the brake fluid level sensor.
severity: Moderate - Affects braking system warning.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the brake fluid level sensor.

title: Brake Booster Sensor Circuit Low Input
description: This code indicates a low input signal from the brake booster sensor circuit.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, reduced brake assist, hard brake pedal.
causes: Wiring issue (high resistance, low voltage), faulty brake booster sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the brake booster sensor.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects braking performance.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the brake booster sensor.

title: Brake Booster Sensor Circuit High Input
description: This code indicates a high input signal from the brake booster sensor circuit.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, potentially overly sensitive brakes.
causes: Wiring issue (short to power), faulty brake booster sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the brake booster sensor.
severity: Moderate - Affects braking performance.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the brake booster sensor.

title: Brake Booster Sensor Circuit Intermittent
description: This code indicates an intermittent signal from the brake booster sensor circuit.
symptoms: ABS warning light may illuminate intermittently, brake assist may be erratic.
causes: Loose wiring or connectors, faulty brake booster sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the brake booster sensor.
severity: Moderate - Can cause unpredictable braking behavior.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to monitor live data from the brake booster sensor while driving.

title: Traction Control System (TCS) Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction within the Traction Control System (TCS).
symptoms: Traction control light illuminated, ABS warning light may also be on.
causes: Various issues with TCS components (wheel speed sensors, ABS module, steering angle sensor, etc.).
solutions: Use a scan tool to retrieve more specific TCS-related codes and diagnose accordingly.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects vehicle stability.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read TCS-related data and perform system tests.

title: Electronic Stability Control (ESC) System Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction within the Electronic Stability Control (ESC) System.
symptoms: Stability control light illuminated, ABS and traction control lights may also be on.
causes: Various issues with ESC components (yaw rate sensor, lateral acceleration sensor, steering angle sensor, ABS module, etc.).
solutions: Use a scan tool to retrieve more specific ESC-related codes and diagnose accordingly.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects vehicle stability.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read ESC-related data and perform system tests.

title: Anti-Lock Brake System (ABS) Control Module Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction within the Anti-Lock Brake System (ABS) Control Module.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, brake warning light may also be on, ABS not functioning.
causes: Internal fault in the ABS control module, power or ground issues to the module.
solutions: Check power and ground to the ABS control module, diagnose and replace the ABS control module if necessary.
severity: High - Affects braking safety.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to attempt communication with the ABS control module and retrieve any internal fault codes.

title: Brake Force Distribution (EBD) System Malfunction
description: This code indicates a malfunction within the Electronic Brake Force Distribution (EBD) system.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, brake warning light may also be on.
causes: Often related to issues with wheel speed sensors or the ABS control module.
solutions: Diagnose any related ABS or wheel speed sensor codes, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects braking stability.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check EBD-related data and any other related ABS codes.

title: Brake Assist System Malfunction
description: This code indicates a malfunction within the Brake Assist System.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, brake assist may not function in emergency stops.
causes: Issues with brake pedal sensor, brake booster sensor, or the ABS control module.
solutions: Diagnose related brake pedal or booster sensor codes, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate - Affects emergency braking performance.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check brake assist related data and any other related ABS codes.

title: Hill Start Assist System Malfunction
description: This code indicates a malfunction within the Hill Start Assist System.
symptoms: Hill start assist not functioning.
causes: Issues with brake pedal sensor, ABS module, or other related sensors.
solutions: Diagnose related brake pedal or ABS codes, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Low - Affects convenience feature.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check hill start assist related data and any other related ABS codes.

title: Downhill Assist Control System Malfunction
description: This code indicates a malfunction within the Downhill Assist Control System.
symptoms: Downhill assist control not functioning.
causes: Issues with brake system, ABS module, or other related sensors.
solutions: Diagnose related brake or ABS codes, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Low - Affects convenience feature (primarily off-road).
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check downhill assist control related data and any other related ABS codes.

title: Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) System Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction within the Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) System.
symptoms: EPB warning light illuminated, electronic parking brake not functioning.
causes: Wiring issues, faulty EPB actuator, faulty EPB control module, brake system issues.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the EPB actuator and control module, diagnose the brake system.
severity: Moderate - Affects parking brake functionality.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to retrieve EPB-specific fault codes and perform system tests.

title: Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) Actuator Circuit Malfunction - Right Rear
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the right rear Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) actuator.
symptoms: EPB warning light illuminated, right rear parking brake not functioning.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty right rear EPB actuator, faulty EPB control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the right rear EPB actuator, diagnose the EPB control module.
severity: Moderate - Affects right rear parking brake.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to perform EPB actuator tests.

title: Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) Actuator Circuit Malfunction - Left Rear
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the left rear Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) actuator.
symptoms: EPB warning light illuminated, left rear parking brake not functioning.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty left rear EPB actuator, faulty EPB control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the left rear EPB actuator, diagnose the EPB control module.
severity: Moderate - Affects left rear parking brake.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to perform EPB actuator tests.

title: Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) Switch Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) switch.
symptoms: EPB warning light illuminated, inability to operate the electronic parking brake.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty EPB switch, faulty EPB control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the EPB switch, diagnose the EPB control module.
severity: Moderate - Affects parking brake operation.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to monitor EPB switch status.

title: Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) Control Module Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction within the Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) Control Module.
symptoms: EPB warning light illuminated, electronic parking brake not functioning.
causes: Internal fault in the EPB control module, power or ground issues to the module.
solutions: Check power and ground to the EPB control module, diagnose and replace the EPB control module if necessary.
severity: Moderate - Affects parking brake functionality.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to attempt communication with the EPB control module and retrieve any internal fault codes.

title: Brake Temperature Sensor Circuit Malfunction - Right Front
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the right front brake temperature sensor (if equipped).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, potential brake performance issues.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty right front brake temperature sensor, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the right front brake temperature sensor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Low to Moderate - Affects brake monitoring.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the right front brake temperature sensor.

title: Brake Temperature Sensor Circuit Malfunction - Left Front
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the left front brake temperature sensor (if equipped).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, potential brake performance issues.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty left front brake temperature sensor, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the left front brake temperature sensor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Low to Moderate - Affects brake monitoring.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the left front brake temperature sensor.

title: Brake Temperature Sensor Circuit Malfunction - Right Rear
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the right rear brake temperature sensor (if equipped).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, potential brake performance issues.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty right rear brake temperature sensor, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the right rear brake temperature sensor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Low to Moderate - Affects brake monitoring.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the right rear brake temperature sensor.

title: Brake Temperature Sensor Circuit Malfunction - Left Rear
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the left rear brake temperature sensor (if equipped).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, potential brake performance issues.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty left rear brake temperature sensor, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the left rear brake temperature sensor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Low to Moderate - Affects brake monitoring.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the left rear brake temperature sensor.

title: Steering Wheel Position Sensor Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the steering wheel position sensor (often integrated with the steering angle sensor).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated, power steering issues.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty steering wheel position sensor, miscalibration.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the steering wheel position sensor, perform calibration if necessary.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects stability and steering systems.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the steering wheel position sensor.

title: Longitudinal Acceleration Sensor Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the longitudinal acceleration sensor (used for stability control, etc.).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty longitudinal acceleration sensor, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the longitudinal acceleration sensor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects stability control.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the longitudinal acceleration sensor.

title: Lateral Acceleration Sensor Calibration Incomplete
description: This code indicates that the calibration for the lateral acceleration sensor is incomplete.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated.
causes: Recent replacement of the sensor or ABS control module without proper calibration, vehicle alignment issues.
solutions: Perform lateral acceleration sensor calibration using a scan tool, check and adjust vehicle alignment.
severity: Moderate - Affects stability control.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check the calibration status of the lateral acceleration sensor.

title: Yaw Rate Sensor Calibration Incomplete
description: This code indicates that the calibration for the yaw rate sensor is incomplete.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated.
causes: Recent replacement of the sensor or ABS control module without proper calibration, vehicle alignment issues.
solutions: Perform yaw rate sensor calibration using a scan tool, check and adjust vehicle alignment.
severity: Moderate - Affects stability control.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check the calibration status of the yaw rate sensor.

title: Steering Angle Sensor Calibration Incomplete
description: This code indicates that the calibration for the steering angle sensor is incomplete.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated, power steering issues.
causes: Recent replacement of the sensor or ABS control module without proper calibration, vehicle alignment issues.
solutions: Perform steering angle sensor calibration using a scan tool, check and adjust vehicle alignment.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects stability and steering systems.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check the calibration status of the steering angle sensor.

title: Brake Pressure Sensor Calibration Incomplete
description: This code indicates that the calibration for the brake pressure sensor is incomplete.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, potential issues with brake assist or other ABS functions.
causes: Recent replacement of the sensor or ABS control module without proper calibration.
solutions: Perform brake pressure sensor calibration using a scan tool.
severity: Moderate - Affects ABS functionality.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check the calibration status of the brake pressure sensor.

title: Longitudinal Acceleration Sensor Calibration Incomplete
description: This code indicates that the calibration for the longitudinal acceleration sensor is incomplete.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated.
causes: Recent replacement of the sensor or ABS control module without proper calibration.
solutions: Perform longitudinal acceleration sensor calibration using a scan tool.
severity: Moderate - Affects stability control.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check the calibration status of the longitudinal acceleration sensor.

title: Brake Fluid Level Sensor Calibration Incomplete
description: This code indicates that the calibration for the brake fluid level sensor is incomplete.
symptoms: Brake warning light may be illuminated or inaccurate.
causes: Recent replacement of the sensor or ABS control module without proper calibration.
solutions: Perform brake fluid level sensor calibration using a scan tool.
severity: Low to Moderate - Affects brake system warning.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check the calibration status of the brake fluid level sensor.

title: Brake Booster Sensor Calibration Incomplete
description: This code indicates that the calibration for the brake booster sensor is incomplete.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, potential issues with brake assist.
causes: Recent replacement of the sensor or ABS control module without proper calibration.
solutions: Perform brake booster sensor calibration using a scan tool.
severity: Moderate - Affects braking performance.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check the calibration status of the brake booster sensor.

title: Wheel Speed Sensor Power Supply Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the power supply circuit for the wheel speed sensors.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, multiple wheel speed sensor codes may be present.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty ABS control module supplying power.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check power supply voltage to the wheel speed sensors, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power and ground to the wheel speed sensors.

title: Wheel Speed Sensor Power Supply Circuit Low
description: This code indicates a low voltage in the power supply circuit for the wheel speed sensors.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, intermittent wheel speed sensor readings.
causes: Wiring issue (high resistance, low voltage supply), faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check power supply voltage, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power supply voltage to the wheel speed sensors.

title: Wheel Speed Sensor Power Supply Circuit High
description: This code indicates a high voltage in the power supply circuit for the wheel speed sensors.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, potential damage to sensors.
causes: Wiring issue (short to power), faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check for short to power, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: High - Can damage sensors.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power supply voltage to the wheel speed sensors.

title: Wheel Speed Sensor Signal Circuit Open
description: This code indicates an open circuit in the signal circuit for one or more wheel speed sensors.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, affected wheel speed data not available.
causes: Open wiring or connectors to a wheel speed sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors to all wheel speed sensors for continuity.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check continuity of the signal wires for each wheel speed sensor.

title: Wheel Speed Sensor Signal Circuit Short to Ground
description: This code indicates a short circuit to ground in the signal circuit for one or more wheel speed sensors.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, erratic wheel speed data.
causes: Wiring short to ground in the signal wire of a wheel speed sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors to all wheel speed sensors for shorts to ground.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check for shorts to ground on the signal wires of each wheel speed sensor.

title: Wheel Speed Sensor Signal Circuit Short to Battery
description: This code indicates a short circuit to battery voltage in the signal circuit for one or more wheel speed sensors.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, potentially high readings from sensors.
causes: Wiring short to power in the signal wire of a wheel speed sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors to all wheel speed sensors for shorts to power.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and traction control, potential sensor damage.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check for shorts to power on the signal wires of each wheel speed sensor.

title: Brake Pressure Sensor Power Supply Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the power supply circuit for the brake pressure sensor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, brake assist issues.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty ABS control module supplying power.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check power supply voltage to the brake pressure sensor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and brake assist.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power and ground to the brake pressure sensor.

title: Brake Pressure Sensor Power Supply Circuit Low
description: This code indicates a low voltage in the power supply circuit for the brake pressure sensor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, reduced or no brake assist.
causes: Wiring issue (high resistance, low voltage supply), faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check power supply voltage, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS and brake assist.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power supply voltage to the brake pressure sensor.

title: Brake Pressure Sensor Power Supply Circuit High
description: This code indicates a high voltage in the power supply circuit for the brake pressure sensor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, potentially erratic braking behavior.

solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check for short to power, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate - Affects ABS and braking performance.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power supply voltage to the brake pressure sensor.

description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the power supply circuit for the yaw rate sensor.

diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power and ground to the yaw rate sensor.

description: This code indicates a low voltage in the power supply circuit for the yaw rate sensor.

solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check power supply voltage, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects stability control.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power supply voltage to the yaw rate sensor.

severity: Moderate to High - Affects stability control.

description: This code indicates a low voltage in the power supply circuit for the lateral acceleration sensor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated, intermittent issues.

solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check power supply voltage, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects stability control.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power supply voltage to the lateral acceleration sensor.

description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for a brake system pressure release solenoid valve (specific valve not specified).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty solenoid valve, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the solenoid valve, diagnose the ABS control module.

description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for a brake system pressure increase solenoid valve (specific valve not specified).

description: This code indicates an open circuit in the power supply circuit for the brake system solenoid valves.

solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors for continuity, diagnose the ABS control module.

title: Brake System Solenoid Valve Common Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the common circuit for the brake system solenoid valves.

solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the ABS control module.

title: Brake System Solenoid Valve Common Circuit Low
description: This code indicates a low voltage in the common circuit for the brake system solenoid valves.

solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check voltage, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS functionality.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check voltage on the common circuit for the ABS solenoid valves.

title: Brake System Solenoid Valve Common Circuit High
description: This code indicates a high voltage in the common circuit for the brake system solenoid valves.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issue (short to power), faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check for short to power, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS functionality.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check voltage on the common circuit for the ABS solenoid valves.

title: Brake System Solenoid Valve Common Circuit Open
description: This code indicates an open circuit in the common circuit for the brake system solenoid valves.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated.
causes: Open wiring or connectors, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors for continuity, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS functionality.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check continuity of the common circuit for the ABS solenoid valves.

title: ABS   -
description: This code indicates an internal error within the ABS control module (message in Russian).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, ABS not functioning.
causes: Internal fault in the ABS control module.
solutions: Diagnose and replace the ABS control module.
severity: High - Affects braking safety.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to retrieve internal fault codes from the ABS control module.

title: ABS Control Module - EEPROM Error
description: This code indicates an error with the Electrically Erasable Programmable Read-Only Memory (EEPROM) within the ABS control module.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, ABS not functioning.
causes: Faulty ABS control module, corrupted EEPROM data.
solutions: Attempt to reprogram the ABS control module, replace the module if reprogramming fails.
severity: High - Affects braking safety.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to attempt communication and reprogramming of the ABS control module.

title: ABS Control Module -
description: This code indicates a microprocessor error within the ABS control module (message in Russian).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, ABS not functioning.
causes: Internal fault in the ABS control module.
solutions: Diagnose and replace the ABS control module.
severity: High - Affects braking safety.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to retrieve internal fault codes from the ABS control module.

title: ABS Control Module -
description: This code indicates a memory error within the ABS control module (message in Russian).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, ABS not functioning.
causes: Internal fault in the ABS control module.
solutions: Diagnose and replace the ABS control module.
severity: High - Affects braking safety.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to retrieve internal fault codes from the ABS control module.

title: ABS Control Module -
description: This code indicates a communication error with the ABS control module (message in Russian).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, inability to communicate with the ABS module using a scan tool.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short) on the communication lines, faulty ABS control module, faulty scan tool.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors on the communication lines, check power and ground to the ABS module, try a different scan tool, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: High - Affects braking safety and diagnostics.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter and oscilloscope (if available) to check the communication lines to the ABS module.

title: ABS Right Rear Outlet Valve Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the right rear ABS outlet valve.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty right rear ABS outlet valve, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the right rear ABS outlet valve, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS functionality.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to perform ABS valve tests.

title: ABS Left Rear Outlet Valve Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the left rear ABS outlet valve.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty left rear ABS outlet valve, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the left rear ABS outlet valve, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS functionality.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to perform ABS valve tests.

title: ABS Pump Motor Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the ABS pump motor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty ABS pump motor, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the ABS pump motor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS functionality.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to perform ABS pump motor tests.

title: ABS Pump Motor Circuit Low
description: This code indicates a low voltage or current in the circuit for the ABS pump motor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated.
causes: Wiring issue (high resistance, low voltage supply), faulty ABS pump motor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check power supply to the ABS pump motor, diagnose the ABS pump motor.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects ABS functionality.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check voltage and current to the ABS pump motor.

title: Lateral Acceleration Sensor Circuit Intermittent
description: This code indicates an intermittent signal from the lateral acceleration sensor circuit.
symptoms: ABS warning light may illuminate intermittently, traction control/stability control may engage unexpectedly.
causes: Loose wiring or connectors, faulty lateral acceleration sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the lateral acceleration sensor.
severity: Moderate - Can cause unpredictable stability control behavior.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to monitor live data from the lateral acceleration sensor while driving.

title: Brake Fluid Level Sensor Circuit High Input
description: This code indicates a high input signal from the brake fluid level sensor circuit.
symptoms: Brake warning light may not illuminate when fluid is low (if this is the failure mode), ABS warning light may also illuminate.
causes: Wiring issue (short to power), faulty brake fluid level sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the brake fluid level sensor.
severity: Moderate - Affects braking system warning.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the brake fluid level sensor.

title: Brake Fluid Level Sensor Circuit Intermittent
description: This code indicates an intermittent signal from the brake fluid level sensor circuit.
symptoms: Brake warning light may flicker, ABS warning light may illuminate intermittently.
causes: Loose wiring or connectors, faulty brake fluid level sensor.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the brake fluid level sensor.
severity: Moderate - Can cause unreliable brake fluid level warning.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to monitor live data from the brake fluid level sensor while driving.

title: Brake Booster Sensor Circuit Malfunction
description: This code indicates a general malfunction in the circuit for the brake booster sensor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, brake assist issues, hard brake pedal.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty brake booster sensor, faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, diagnose the brake booster sensor, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects braking performance.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to read live data from the brake booster sensor.

title: Traction Control System (TCS) Disabled Request
description: This code indicates that a request has been made to disable the Traction Control System (TCS).
symptoms: Traction control light may be illuminated.
causes: Driver manually disabling TCS via a switch, another system requesting TCS to be disabled.
solutions: Check if the TCS has been manually disabled. Diagnose any other systems that may be requesting TCS to be disabled.
severity: Low - Affects driver assistance feature.
diagnosis: Use a scan tool to check the status of the TCS and any related system requests.

symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated, power steering issues.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short), faulty ABS control module supplying power.

severity: Moderate to High - Affects stability and steering systems.
diagnosis: Use a multimeter to check power and ground to the steering angle sensor.

title: Steering Angle Sensor Power Supply Circuit Low
description: This code indicates a low voltage in the power supply circuit for the steering angle sensor.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, traction control light illuminated, stability control light illuminated, intermittent issues.
causes: Wiring issue (high resistance, low voltage supply), faulty ABS control module.
solutions: Inspect wiring and connectors, check power supply voltage, diagnose the ABS control module.
severity: Moderate to High - Affects stability and steering systems.

title: ABS Control Module -
description: This code indicates a power supply fault to the ABS control module (message in Russian).
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminated, ABS not functioning.
causes: Wiring issues (open, short) in the power or ground supply to the ABS module, faulty ABS control module.
